alert.note: Alert for De Soto; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 9:19PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern De Soto and northwestern Sabine Parishes through 945 PM CDT... At 918 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Converse, or 15 miles southwest of Mansfield, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, South Mansfield, Grand Cane and Stanley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
